AddObject.ConfigEntryObject: <Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>ComplianceRuleViolationsByFramework</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2} has {0} rule violations and {1} pending attestation cases", SizeValue ,ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>false</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>AttestationOpenCasesByFrameworkMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>AttestationOpenCasesByFrameworkYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#Number of pending attestation cases in {1} {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"),)</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Pending attestation cases")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Attestation policies in this framework")</SizeValueTerm></Object>
